# ErrorDetails


## Fields

| Field                                                                             | Type                                                                              | Required                                                                          | Description                                                                       |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `message`                                                                         | *str*                                                                             | :heavy_check_mark:                                                                | The message of the error that caused the<br/>annotation request to go to error phase. |
